item.description:
1. Given the late start time, optionally meet at nearby Great Bay at 7:00+ for pre-dinner cocktails. It's at 500 Comm Ave (http://www.hotelcommo....

2. Dinner at Petit Robert at 8pm. Note Petit Robert has two locations. This is the one in Kenmore Square.

(As always, the attendance fee is just to recoup Meetup.com charges I incur.)
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Meetup group, or my name.
item.why: Petit Robert Bistro has genuine French cuisine at low prices. It is the successor to the venerable Maison Robert that operated in the old Town Hall for many years.
item.name: Petit Robert Bistro (Kenmore Sq)
